```{r entropy_analysis}
mutual_info <- function(x, y, bins = 10) {
  
  clip_set <- na.omit(data.frame(x, y))
  
  y2d <- discretize2d(clip_set$x, clip_set$y, numBins1 = bins, numBins2 = bins)
  y_entropy <- entropy(discretize(na.omit(y), numBins = bins))
  
  mi.empirical(y2d)/y_entropy
}

mutual_info(peat6_daily$Tw, peat6_daily$mgCH4)

lag_mi <- vector("double", lags)
for (i in 1:lags) {
  x_lag <- dplyr::lag(test$Tair, n = i)
  lag_mi[[i]] <- mutual_info(x_lag, peat6_daily$mgCH4, bins = 10)
}


#calculate at multiple lags of x
lag_mi <- function(x, y, lags, bins = 10) {
  
  lag_mi <- vector("double", lags) #store lagged MI values
  
  for (i in 1:lags) {
    x_lag <- dplyr::lag(x, n = i)
    lag_mi[[i]] <- mutual_info(x_lag, y, bins)
  }
  
  plot(lag_mi, xlab = "Time lag", ylab = "MI (relative)") 
}

mutual_info(peat6_all$TA.x, peat6_all$wm, bins = 10)

mi_timeseries <- function(x, y, data_list, bins = 10) {

  mi_series <- vector("double", nrow(data_list)) #vector to store mutual information
  
  #iterate through indexed datasets and calculate relative MI
  for (i in 1:nrow(data_list)) {
    current_df <- data_list$data[[i]] #extract current dataframe
    x_var <- eval(substitute(x), current_df)
    y_var <- eval(substitute(y), current_df)

    mi_series[[i]] <- mutual_info(x_var, y_var, bins)
  }
  mi_series
}
```
